Item.name: activitydiff
Item.author: Jake Valletta (jakev)
Item.about: Get all activities that were added to the AOSP version of the package.

Item.name: apkget
Item.author: Jake Valletta (jakev)
Item.about: Pull or search for a package on the device.

Item.name: appdexdb
Item.author: Jake Valletta (jakev)
Item.about: Create dexdb for an application or all AOSP applications.

Item.name: appdiff
Item.author: Jake Valletta (jakev)
Item.about: Get all components that were added to the AOSP version of the package.

Item.name: bindiff
Item.author: Jake Valletta (jakev)
Item.about: Get a listing of OEM added binaries (diff the AOSP).

Item.name: classsearch
Item.author: Jake Valletta (jakev)
Item.about: Search class files for classname (requires DEX databases).

Item.name: devdb
Item.author: Jake Valletta (jakev)
Item.about: Create and manage a database with device driver details.

Item.name: devdiff
Item.author: Jake Valletta (jakev)
Item.about: Print devices that are not part of the AOSP image.

Item.name: drozer
Item.author: Jake Valletta (jakev)
Item.about: Starts a drozer session on the device (requires Drozer install).

Item.name: findimp
Item.author: Jake Valletta (jakev)
Item.about: Attempt to find the implementation of a system service.

Item.name: framework2jar
Item.author: Jake Valletta (jakev)
Item.about: Convert a framework DEX JAR to a Java JAR for importing into Eclipse.

Item.name: frameworkdb
Item.author: Jake Valletta (jakev)
Item.about: Create and manipulate a database containing Android framework data.

Item.name: frameworkdexdb
Item.author: Jake Valletta (jakev)
Item.about: Create dexdb for a framework file or all frameworks.

Item.name: frameworkdiff
Item.author: Jake Valletta (jakev)
Item.about: Get a listing of OEM added framework files.

Item.name: frameworkres
Item.author: Jake Valletta (jakev)
Item.about: Configure framework resources for unpacking and repacking.

Item.name: getbins
Item.author: Jake Valletta (jakev)
Item.about: Pull all system binaries (/bin/sh) to project directory.

Item.name: getframeworks
Item.author: Jake Valletta (jakev)
Item.about: Pull all framework JARs (and ODEX files) and framework resources to project directory.

Item.name: getpermissions
Item.author: Jake Valletta (jakev)
Item.about: Download all the /etc/permission files.

Item.name: getsyslibs
Item.author: Jake Valletta (jakev)
Item.about: Get app system libraries off the device.

Item.name: installdrozer
Item.author: Jake Valletta (jakev)
Item.about: Installs Drozer APK on the test device.

Item.name: intentsender
Item.author: Jake Valletta (jakev)
Item.about: Attempt to launch the DebugIntentSender activity.

Item.name: libinfo
Item.author: Jake Valletta (jakev)
Item.about: Get information about a shared library (SO).

Item.name: mkaosp
Item.author: Jake Valletta (jakev)
Item.about: Generates data needed for comparing projects.

Item.name: newapp
Item.author: Jake Valletta (jakev)
Item.about: Copy a blank, compiled, application for building.

Item.name: oatdextract
Item.author: Jake Valletta (jakev)
Item.about: Extract DEX files from OAT file.

Item.name: permissions
Item.author: Jake Valletta (jakev)
Item.about: Simple permision printer.

Item.name: platformdiff
Item.author: Jake Valletta (jakev)
Item.about: Parse the /system/etc/permissions/platform.xml file.

Item.name: providerdiff
Item.author: Jake Valletta (jakev)
Item.about: Get all components that were added to the AOSP version of the package.

Item.name: receiverdiff
Item.author: Jake Valletta (jakev)
Item.about: Get all receivers that were added to the AOSP version of the package.

Item.name: secretcode
Item.author: Jake Valletta (jakev)
Item.about: Send an android_secret_code broadcast.

Item.name: servicediff
Item.author: Jake Valletta (jakev)
Item.about: Get all services that were added to the AOSP version of the package.

Item.name: sharedid
Item.author: Jake Valletta (jakev)
Item.about: Find all shared ID occurances for a give useSharedId string.

Item.name: sysappdb
Item.author: Jake Valletta (jakev)
Item.about: System application database manipulation.

Item.name: sysappdiff
Item.author: Jake Valletta (jakev)
Item.about: Get a listing of OEM added system applications (diff the AOSP).

Item.name: syslibdiff
Item.author: Jake Valletta (jakev)
Item.about: List OEM added system libraries.

Item.name: sysservicedb
Item.author: Jake Valletta (jakev)
Item.about: Create and manage system service database.

Item.name: testperm
Item.author: Jake Valletta (jakev)
Item.about: Just a sample permissions and uses-permission generator.

Item.name: unframework
Item.author: Jake Valletta (jakev)
Item.about: Unpack all framework files, and unODEX framework files (if present).

Item.name: userapps
Item.author: Jake Valletta (jakev)
Item.about: Get list of applications installed by a user (JB+).

Item.name: usesperm
Item.author: Jake Valletta (jakev)
Item.about: Just a sample uses-permission generator.

Item.name: AppDb
Item.about: Application Database API
Item.author: Jake Valletta (jakev)

Item.name: PyElfTools
Item.about: Pure-python library for parsing ELF and DWARF
